Name: Color Chain
About the game: Color Chain is a small casual tile-matching video game. Create Color Chains by linking tiles of alternating colors, and rotate them to create groups of 7 or more similarly colored tiles! Create longer Color Chains and combos to reach higher and higher scores! Game played entirely with mouse. Game available in English and French. Game by Djack D Donovan Music and Sounds by Corentin Brasart Icons by Marie Sivignon
